metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0193 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against a malicious binary may cause an out-of-bounds read, which may result in a limited denial of service and limited information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
